subject: Sexual Health
title: The Future of Sexual Neuroscience
description: One-minute skill: The Future of Sexual Neuroscience.

hook.text: Brain imaging technology is revealing secrets of human sexuality that were invisible just decades ago.

buildup.text: fMRI and PET scans now allow researchers to observe brain activity during arousal, orgasm, and bonding in real time.

discovery.text: Neurofeedback therapy is being explored to help people with sexual dysfunction retrain their brain responses.

twist.text: Brain-computer interfaces may one day allow direct stimulation of pleasure circuits for people with spinal injuries.

climax.text: As technology advances, the line between therapy and enhancement will raise new ethical questions about sexuality.

punchline.text: We are only beginning to understand the sexual brain.

quiz.question: What emerging therapy could help retrain sexual brain responses?
